Package app.cards.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HandValue
    This interface represents any assortment of Cards that have showdown value.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardSequence
    A CardSequence encapsulates a list of Card object with consecutive Ranks.
    EvaluationHelper
    EvaluationHelper offers static helper methods for common tasks in hand evaluation.
    Flush
    This class encapsulate five Cards that make a flush.
    FullHouse
    This class encapsulates a three of a kind and a pair that together make a full house.
    Hand
    This class represents a poker hand (hole cards + community cards) and offers a method for evaluating the value of that hand (Hand.evaluate()).
    HandResult
    Encapsulates the result of the evaluation of a Hand initiated by calling Hand.evaluate().
    HandResultList
    This class maintains a List of HandResults and offers funtionality to rank these results based on their HandValues, including tie detection.
    NOfAKind
    Represents an assortment of Cards with equal {link Rank}.
    Straight  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HandType
    List all possible poker hand types with their names and an integer value to enable comparisons.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalCardException
    Indicates that an invalid Card (with non-matching Rank) has been attempted to add to an NOfAKind.
    IllegalFlushException
    Indicates that a Flush has been attempted to create with an invalid Set of Cards.
    IllegalFullHouseException
    Indicates that a FullHouse has been attempted to create with an invalid List of NOfAKinds.
    IllegalHandException
    Indicates that a Hand has been attempted to create from an invalid Set of Cards.
    IllegalNOfAKindAccessException
    Indicates that NOfAKind.getNBestCardsAsNewNOfAKind(int) has been called with a parameter value greater than the number of cards in that NOfAKind.
    IllegalNOfAKindException
    Indicates that an NOfAKind has been attempted to create from an invalid Set of Cards (because their Ranks did not match).
    IllegalStraightException
    Indicates that a Straight has been attempted to create from an invalid List of Cards (with a length other than 5).
    InvalidHandEvaluationException
    Indicates that no valid HandType could be identified while evaluating a Hand.
    ResultIdNotPresentInResultListException
    Indicates that the ranking position of a HandResult within an HandResultList was requested via the HandResult's ID, but no HandResult with such ID was found in the HandResultList.
    UnsupportedHandTypeException
    Indicates that a HandResult was compared to another one with an invalid HandType.
